thread.title: Serious accident closes A38 in Devon
thread.title_full: Serious accident closes A38 in Devon | West Country (W) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Serious accident closes A38 in Devon
text:
Accident investigation work is underway after a serious accident on the A38 in Devon early this morning.
Haldon Hill Westbound is currently closed between Harcombe Road and the B3344 (the Chudleigh / Kingsteignton turn off).
DevonCornwall Police @DC_Police Follow Serious accident A38, diversions southbound from Splatford Split junction to Chudleigh Station Overbridge. #accident #a38 #haldon #chudleigh
01:53 - 16 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Wed 16 Sep 2015 Travel Devon
